title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: Former ministers include: fr:Abderrahmane Benbouzid (January 4, 2020–September 8, 2022) ... In 2020, there were according to the Ministry 586 public health establishments in Algeria. There are 69,948 beds in CHU, EHU, EH, EHS, and EPH establishments and 6,584 beds in community hospitals (EPSP).

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform
snippet: ALGIERS- A total of 77 new confirmed Covid-19 cases, 64 recoveries and four deaths were recorded in the last 24 hours in Algeria, announced Sunday the Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform.
